channel.title: LionScape
channel.description:
[size=15pt]Welcome to Lion-Scape[/size]
Hello I started some forums on june 30th and they where about moparscape runescape. But now i did some coding i know how to do it so now i am here to code a server. I have 1 coder but i was unable to talk to him. Here are some postions that i need filled or join my forum
1 Of my rules is NO asking to be admin. If you do then that is a 1 day ban.
http://projectlolv1.smfforfree3.com/index.php/board,1.0.html <------------ SITE
We use project Lol and i give many credits to the coder of that server but i am making some ajustments to it. Not major.
Lol is the owner.
Come and join my forums hoster gets co-owner
Tester global mod
Player=NOTHING!!!! lol. :P
I just have a problem with my hosting i got it online last night and then today it wont work

item.title: LionScape
item.dc:creator: @doggiedoo86 doggiedoo86
item.description:
@doggiedoo86 wrote:

ok…

Ok this is it all the scammers out there die in hell! i lost forums 1.7m i am sick of this! i mean you might make this 11 yr old kid cry ecause he spent 20hrs working on something and in 10 seconds. its gone thats what happened to my forums so right now i making forums called project anti-scam to hope that this helps new people, to not get scammed!

here is the site i need members or i wont do it!

http://antiscammer.smfforfree3.com/

Read full topic

item.title: LionScape
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

[quote=“doggiedoo86, post:1, topic:123865”]So far we have 11 members we need more we are going to GROW![br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 08:09:46 AM[/size][hr]Well i start out with the lagging server (erm that will work) And what files do you need i am ready to host it
[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 08:11:27 AM[/size][hr]bump Joining is free![br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 08:25:17 AM[/size][hr]LionScape has a forum now As my other ones where scammed by A guy Named “james” he has many forums his scammed many people[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 11:08:52 AM[/size][hr]Ok this is it all the scammers out there die in hell! i lost forums 1.7m i am sick of this! i mean you might make this 11 yr old kid cry ecause he spent 20hrs working on something and in 10 seconds. its gone thats what happened to my forums so right now i making forums called project anti-scam to hope that this helps new people, to not get scammed!

here is the site i need members or i wont do it!

http://antiscammer.smfforfree3.com/[/quote]

Don’t repost 5 times…

Read full topic

item.title: LionScape
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

[quote=“doggiedoo86, post:5, topic:123496”]So does that mean you’ll do stuff on your pc to make lag? lol jk i’ll do that but i have to code join my forums[/quote]no no no look

a dedicated server is a sort of a computer based on internet it is only used for the host of 1 server it is better then any home computer at hosting any server of what so-ever (can be a website,forum,game…)

when you host a server on ure pc,and for example start media player ure pc memory gets filled but ure server needs that memory so it has not enof memory starts to lag,and shuts down after a while.
also a dedicated server runs 24/7 ure computer sometimes will need to be turned of,or be restarter from an update or instalment.

1 slot has been taken means 1 is using a dedicated server of me,i can say hes has one of the 10 lagless servers around here.

Read full topic

So does that mean you’ll do stuff on your pc to make lag? lol jk i’ll do that but i have to code join my forums

item.title: LionScape
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

[quote=“doggiedoo86, post:3, topic:123496”]I just noticed but i will NOT PAY YOU TO HOST! I have all the tools just have to port forward.[/quote]ok sure but let me note you :

Using a PC to host :

own pc (you cant leave it on forever)
mommy or daddy will eventally tell you to turn it off
not dedicated (means lag when you do something on ure pc)
more risk on crash

Using Dedicated Server

Lag free
Auto Restarter
Cheating Protection
24/7
crash protection+scanner

a dedicated server costs ±

1200€
or 69€ a month

I can rehire 1 for 300k rs2 cash a month(if u dont belive me just google a bit)
or 100k a week

Read full topic
